title: Ordering Mastery Pages NOT WORKING!! (PLEASE HELP ME) :(
body: Hello, this is something that has really been bothering me for the past couple of hours. I've been trying to order all my mastery pages so that when I get into champion select, I can scroll to a section and it will already have all the pages for that role. Everytime I finally order all of them by Role, AP/AD/Tank, and keystone, and click save, the masteries soon revert themselves to some random order. I do not know why this is happening and it is REALLY bothering me. Is there something I'm doing wrong? Please someone help me with this because I can not play the game until I have my masteries organized! :(

replies.body: I'd be pretty frustrated if I kept trying to sort my masteries but run into issues.  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech guys can take look into this with you directly.  In the meantime, grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a repair to see if this might be caused by an bad game assets.  Otherwise, we'll see you in your ticket!

The hextech repair tool worked! Thank you so much.
